table.title: Orders by Product and Customer Email Domain

search.query: sourcetype="aws:csv:*" source=*.csv sourcetype="aws:csv:monthly_revenue_billing_and_revenue_data" Customer_AWS_Account_Number!="Customer AWS Account Number" | eval net_amount=(Customer_Billed_Amount + AWS_Fee) | dedup net_amount | stats list(net_amount) AS "Net Amount" by Customer_Email_Domain, Product_Title | rename Product_Title AS "Product", Customer_Email_Domain AS "Customer Email" |sort - "Net Amount"

sourcetype="aws:csv:daily_business_usage_by_instance_type" source=*.csv | rex field=source "^\w+\d+://\w+\-\w+\-\w+/\w+_\w+_\w+_\w+_(?P<kdate>[^\.]+)" | eval newtime=strptime(kdate,"%Y-%m-%d") | eval _time=newtime | timechart sum("Estimated_Revenue") as "Estimated Revenues USD" span=1d

source=*.csv sourcetype="aws:csv:daily_business_usage_by_instance_type" Customer_AWS_Account_Number!="Customer AWS Account Number" Product_Title="*" | rex field=source "^\w+\d+://\w+\-\w+\-\w+/\w+_\w+_\w+_\w+_(?P<kdate>[^\.]+)" | eval newtime=strptime(kdate,"%Y-%m-%d") | eval _time=newtime | timechart dc(Customer_AWS_Account_Number) span=1d
